package.name: rqt
package.description:
rqt is a Qt-based framework for GUI development for ROS. It consists of three parts
rqt - core modules of ROS GUI framework. rqt plugin developers barely needs to pay attention.
rqt_common_plugins - ROS backend tools suite that can be used on/off of robot runtime.
rqt_robot_plugins - Tools for interacting with robots during their runtime.
package.author: Dirk Thomas
Dorian Scholz
Aaron Blasdel
